title: (x) DND Capital Partners, LLC - (Engravers) Medium Roman {Mike Y}
content:
[Sackers Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141459/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/sackers-light-roman/sackers-light-roman/testdrive.html?s=Sackers%2BPartners%2BLCC&p=36) is rather close...   
More likely is it the [Heavy Weight Version](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141459/http:/www.identifont.com/show?422)   
   
Maybe another digital version, or perhaps it is cutomized?
author: nicolai

comments.content: The R and C make me think something by Benguiat.
I think Nikolai is close. I think it is [Agfa's Medium Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141459/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=203060) from the Engravers 1 package.

You are right Mike!   
   
fonts.com seems like an invaluable source when it comes to font-IDs.   
Someday I might remember having a look there as well.   
   
:-)
